valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 9 Oct 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 10 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: High 250 miles west of Sole 1031 expected south Shannon 1034 by 1800 Thursday. New low expected just northwest of Iceland 992 by same time
